document_data.caption: A map of Norland showing Sommersdal on the eastern coast.
document_data.name: Sommersdal
document_data.mainbody: '''Sommersdal''' was a small village located on the island of [[Norland]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The village sat along the western edge of [[South Jotunhammer Mountains]] within the region of Norland called [[Grondsgrunn]] which was controlled by [[giant]]s. The village was found on Norland's eastern coast with the [[Sea of Moonshae]].
